fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- During any phase, modkill someone.
- During any phase, kick someone from the server.
- During any phase, timeout someone for any amount of time.
- During any phase, ban someone. This gives them the @BANNED role.
- During any phase, literally ban someone from the server.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Your abilities take effect immediately and have a limit of 1 per phase.
- At the end of the game, anyone who is banned or still timed out has their punishment removed.
- Roleblock, Conversion, & Control Immunity
- No I didn't change anything if I gave it any more buffs it would be even more stupid
